Parameter.Description: Select the source data table from the dropdown. This table contains the transaction details of the customers.
Customer ID is the column(s) in the data set with customer identification number, phone number or email id that uniquely identifies the customer.
The column with the interaction identification number or interaction date time stamp that uniquely identifies the purchase.
The column with the interaction date i.e date that was captured by the system when the customer made the interaction.
The column with the interaction values that lists the interaction amount the customer for each interaction.

Number of segments: Here you specify the number of segments for the segmentation analysis on RFM scores. Along with RFM analysis this application provides a segmentation analysis based on the recency, frequency and monetary scores calculated for each customer. This will help you to compare the two segmentations for better understanding of your customers.
